name: Millia -The ending-
description: Millia -The ending- is a visual novel made by Millia Soft using Ren'py. The game was successfully funded on kickstarter.com in early 2015.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32 bit Processor: 1.66 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX compatible card Storage: 800 MB available space
